alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lapeer, northwestern Macomb and northwestern St. Clair Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Almont, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Romeo and Almont around 355 PM EDT. Armada around 405 PM EDT. Capac around 410 PM EDT. Memphis around 415 PM EDT. Emmett around 420 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Berville, Riley Center, Allenton and Brockway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
